describe: Monaco is a small sovereign city-state located on the French Riviera in Western Europe. Known for its opulence, casinos, and as a tax haven, Monaco is the second smallest country in the world and the most densely populated. It is famous for its annual Formula 1 Grand Prix and luxurious lifestyle.

cities.name: üè∞ Monaco-Ville
cities.geographical_location: Located on a rocky headland that extends into the Mediterranean Sea, Monaco-Ville is the old town of Monaco.
cities.climate: Monaco-Ville enjoys a Mediterranean climate with mild, wet winters and hot, dry summers.

cities.name: üèù Monte Carlo
cities.geographical_location: Monte Carlo is situated to the north of Monaco-Ville and is known for its casino and luxury hotels.
cities.climate: Monte Carlo shares the Mediterranean climate, characterized by warm summers and mild winters.
